body: - Add support for brew service actions (#50, thanks to @kocerb)
- Use new `brew casks` command for listing casks (fixes #48/#49)

- Update command for getting all brew formulas (thanks to @abbasegbeyemi)
- Add preliminary support for native arm homebrew installation (thanks to @abbasegbeyemi)

- Update Homebrew commands (thanks to @ErikMinekus)
- Hold Option to uninstall and zap Cask (thanks to @ErikMinekus)

- Update Homebrew commands (https://github.com/fniephaus/alfred-homebrew/commit/50287ccd3d2c7585d1c6a146f1888aeed7a78eba, thanks to @ErikMinekus)
- Extend metadata in info.plist (https://github.com/fniephaus/alfred-homebrew/commit/73c28d42d3936da83de4512a993cfd7b643133ce, thanks to @Neberheim)
- Upgrade alfred-workflow dependency to 1.40.0

- Remove obsolete cask checks and only check for brew
- Bug fix for #39
- Fix for #35
- Upgrade alfred-workflow dependency to 1.37.2
- Work around `brew cask search` deprecation warning (#31)

- Add support for cask outdated and cask upgrade (#30); Thanks to @ErikMinekus!
- Upgrade Alfred-Workflow dependency
- Fix links to formulae (#29)

- Remove deprecated update action (Fixes #24, thanks to @ErikMinekus)
- Remove support for deprecated --caskroom option (Fixes #26, thanks to @ErikMinekus)
- Upgrade alfred-workflow dependency
- Update Alfred-Workflow dependency (Fixes #21)

- Remove `cask alfred` since it's deprecated (#16)
- Fix `cask config` (#17)

- Add support for `cat`, `cleanup`, `commands`, `pin`, `unpin` and `outdated`.
- Fix `Alfred-Workflow`-related bug.
- Improve code
- Fix #10 and add #11

- Add HOMEBREW_CASK_OPTS support
- Minor improvements and bugfixes

- Add icons
- Bugfixes and improvements
- Fix update notice

- Check if brew & cask are installed
- Fix issue with brew uninstall/list
Add cask icon

Fix module import error

Thanks to @smargh for reporting this issue!
Add cask support
Enable caching and updates
